title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers; fetch-based, zero native deps.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI); plugins, RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI wrapper for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; shows chunking & retrieval.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama; Rust backend, React frontend.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models inside buffers; supports selection prompts.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Phi-3, CodeLlama, Zephyr, and quantized variants.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Fine-tune Mistral 7B on your GPU then serve with Ollama; includes LoRA adapter conversion.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with dependency injection helpers and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API; tokio/hyper based, published on crates.io.
